intro: Heptapleurum dongnaiense, commonly known as Dong Nai heptapleurum, is a species of flowering plant in the family Actinidiaceae. It is native to Southeast Asia, particularly found in Vietnam and Cambodia. The plant is characterized by its evergreen foliage and small, fragrant flowers that bloom in clusters. It typically grows in moist, shaded environments such as mountain forests. Due to its ornamental value and ecological significance, it is of interest to botanists and conservationists.
